name: AI/ML Podcast Research
description: Research on AI and machine learning through podcast discussions

settings.summaryPrompt:
Create detailed notes from this podcast episode on AI/ML topics. Extract:
- Guest background and expertise
- Main AI/ML concepts discussed
- Technical insights and architecture details
- Predictions and opinions about the field
- Tools, libraries, or papers mentioned
- Actionable advice for practitioners

Ignore: sponsors, ads, promotional content.

Title: {title}
